lego.gracekelly.api
Interface CacheLoader<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Implementing Classes:
GibberishCacheLoader
public interface CacheLoader<T>

The CacheLoader provides a single method to reload cache, based on an existing entry in the cache.

Method Summary
 CacheEntry<T> reload(String key, T prevValue)
          Takes a String key and a value/Object of type and returns a CacheEntry.
 

Method Detail

reload

CacheEntry<T> reload(String key,
                     T prevValue)
                     throws CacheLoaderException
Takes a String key and a value/Object of type and returns a CacheEntry. The implementation of this method is supposed to return the CacheEntry with the latest Value for the given key.

Parameters:
key -
prevValue -
Returns:
CacheEntry of the type parameter specified during declaration of this instance of CacheLoader
Throws:
CacheLoaderException
